tase.name: Shock therapy
tase.des: Tase the streamer for a few seconds

cloak.name: Kick in the head
cloak.des: Send an invisible cloaker after the streamer

flash.name: Spawn flashbangs
flash.des: Spawn a bunch of flashbangs all around players in loud / Blind the streamer in stealth

cheers.name: Buy a drink
cheers.des: Get the streamer slightly drunk, the effect stacks so coordinate with your fellow viewers

jammdrills.name: Jamm drills
jammdrills.des: Break all the active drills on the map. All of them

rewind.name: Rewind
rewind.des: Send the streamer back in time by 8 seconds

special.name: Become special
special.des: The next available special unit that spawns will have your name and will focus on killing the streamer
